name: groundswell (beta)
description:
Groundswell is a companion app designed to help you center yourself in the midst of anxiety or sensory flare-ups.

It contains audio, visual, and tactile/gestural functions, as well as built-in and customizable messages for when you're nonverbal.

This app is still in beta, which means while it has core functionality, I haven't yet teamed up with someone who can help me build the advanced functions I'd like. That said, I hope it helps, and please send me feedback for improvements.
